code-val-screen.title: Validate a code
code-val-screen.subtitle: Hello
code-val-screen.instructions: You can write the code below:

logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?

welcome.title: Welcome to ORATREX, the Oratrex promotions App!
welcome.description: Scan 5 Oratrex Kombutxa bottle barcodes and you will receive a 15% discount for the purchase of the Oratrex 2023 ticket of your choice.
welcome.subtext: Every time you scan a code, you will receive an exclusive NFT!

used-code.title: This code has already been used
used-code.description: This code can only be used once per user

error.bbdd: We are experiencing technical problems, please try again later

Kombutxa.title: You've got the 3 NFTs of Kombutxa!
Kombutxa.description: Now you have a new NFT that will give you access to a 15% discount on your next purchase

update.title: Upgrade available
update.description: Download the latest update to continue enjoying the benefits of ORATREX

qr.title: This is your QR
qr.description: Show it to receive your prize

register-screen.title: Register
register-screen.advice-password: The password must contain a capital letter, a number and a minimum of 8 characters.

code-scanner-screen.instruction: Place the code inside the field to generate your new Ticket

terms-and-conditions-screen.title: Terms and conditions
terms-and-conditions-screen.body: Great! Before continuing and accessing the application, it is important that you read and accept our Terms and Conditions. We recommend that you review them carefully to ensure an optimal experience and to be informed on how to use our services properly.

errors.scan-time: Not enough time has passed to scan another code
